+                     let totalParameterComplexity = 0;

+                     });
+                     
+                     const endpointCount = endpoints.length;
+                     
+                     return {
+                         pathComplexity: (totalPathComplexity / endpointCount).toFixed(1),
+                         parameterComplexity: (totalParameterComplexity / endpointCount).toFixed(1),

+                     };
